description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Miasma is a turn-based strategy game set in a dystopian future; where the mega-corporation Vilhelm Industries rules the world and everyone blindly and inexplicably follows their regime.  Join a small band of rebels, specialise and develop their skills, and lead them in an attempt to restore everyone's individuality.
description.short: Miasma is a turn-based strategy game set in a dystopian future; where the mega-corporation Vilhelm Industries rules the world and everyone blindly and inexplicably follows their regime.  Join a small band of rebels, specialise and develop their skills, and lead them in an attempt to restore everyone's individuality.
